issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.0.183

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

Chrome

Desktop

https://www.dogdrip.net/608361809

AdGuard Base filter

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.0.183

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.dogdrip.net/608361809

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

After updating the extension, the issue seems to stem from the quick fix filter item being removed. Please address this promptly. 

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e2d6504a-65e0-41d6-ab7a-30b84d894a44)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5284d801-1a7f-484b-8f31-ec5370bc4369)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @sophia7209 THe AG Quick Fix filters list has been removed because of MV3 policy enforcement

The problematic filters exist in AG Base filters list. Not AG Quick Fix filters list.
However, the AG MV3 extension users should wait until there is an extension update even if we make a change in a filters list.

If you want to avoid the effect, please use AG MV2 extension in Firefox or Brave web browser.
OR, you can use AdGuard standalone app with a premium license that can be purchased via Stacksocial

>  please note that most users are not using tinyShield alongside it.

I know. However, we have limited cards that deal Ad-Shield reinsertion and anti-adblock if we handle it via filters.
And, due to MV3 policy enforcement, we cannot update any filter without updating the extension.

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.37.2 to 0.37.4
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.37.2 to 0.37.4.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.37.4

  • Stop using module.createRequire, export resolveModule

0.37.3

  • Tweak package.json dependencies to work with pnpm
Commits
  • a4c553a Update to version 0.37.4.
  • 53ff5c4 Stop using module.createRequire (problematic under webpack), incorporate and ...
  • a1da464 Bump json-schema-to-typescript from 15.0.3 to 15.0.4
  • e6ee4cc Bump @​stylistic/eslint-plugin from 2.12.1 to 2.13.0
  • e272b10 Bump eslint from 9.17.0 to 9.18.0
  • 48336b7 Bump @​eslint/js from 9.17.0 to 9.18.0
  • a6cc4cc Bump typescript from 5.7.2 to 5.7.3
  • 4ad6628 Update test repo snapshots.
  • 637975f Update MD039/no-space-in-links to remove outdated validLink helper and simpli...
  • d4352c7 Update test repo snapshots.
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.37.2&new-version=0.37.4)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

comment.body:
The page is clickable on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end. Try to leave only them, update the filters, clear browser data, restart the browser.
Note that `AdGuard Mobile Ads, AdGuard DNS` are redundant. It's better to start with these filters.
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: game8.jp

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

Сначала запускаем Psiphon и только после браузер, где не должно быть прокси-расширений даже с отключенным VPN.
Иначе при подключении Psiphon с запущенным браузером и уже внедрённым AdGuard будет выдавать эту ошибку 451.

@soohwan7528 Hi. Reproduced occasionally. It seems not related to filters. Probably connection timeouts.

Could you please test with this rule added to user rules?
```adblock
@@||com-ctugames-wild.appspot.com^$document
```

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

adguard 4.7 nightly35

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?
